heading: This Afternoon
text: Increasing clouds. A rising chance of showers west of the Greens, mainly mid to late afternoon, chance late in the east. Highs in the mid to upper 50s. South to southwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph east of the Greens, and to 35 mph in the west.

heading: Tonight
text: Evening showers likely east of the Greens, scattered west; showers retracting  into the northern mountains overnight, while mixing with snow and diminishing. Partial clearing in southern valleys. Lows from the mid 30s to around 40, some lower 30s northeast and in the Adirondacks. Southwest winds becoming west 10 to 20 mph, and gusting to 35 mph.

heading: Tuesday
text: Partly cloudy, except mostly sunny in southeastern valleys, and mostly cloudy in the northern mountains, with the chance of rain or snow showers. Highs from the mid 40s to lower 50s north, low to mid 50s in the south. West to northwest winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 40 mph.
